channel.title: Drafts on MillMint
channel.description: Recent content in Drafts on MillMint

item.title: Intro
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-pink); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-pink); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-pink); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-pink); } Welcome to the Epoch of Rest S UTOPIA Introduction ﬂ∑ This article is about Hobart’s utopia, called Vekllei 1. What is this project? ¬∂ Utopia has a lot of definitions, but in the end it’s about what it feels like.

item.title: Life as a Shill for Big Corporate
item.description: ‚ùñ Note from the Editor This article was originally published in November 2020. üíª A Bite of the Apple: Petticoat Socialism and the Biggest Tech Company in the World ¬∂ Hobart Phillips ¬∂ I use Apple products as the primary interfaces for consumer tech in most parts of my life. I use an iPhone paired to an Apple Watch and AirPods on the go, a MacBook Air at home, and an AppleTV in the living room.

item.title: Characters
item.description: .markdown a { color: var(--color-pink); } .markdown a.anchor { color: var(--color-pink); } aside nav ul a { color: var(--color-pink); } #headerbox .emoji { color: var(--color-pink); } Cast of Characters ¬• UTOPIA Introduction ﬂ∑ This article is about Hobart’s characters, who live in Vekllei Overview ¬∂ This article is still under construction (as of mid-January) but should be done soon. Thanks for your understanding.

item.title: Home
item.description: Studio MillMint Home of ‚ùñ Vekllei ‚ùñ Welcome Welcome to MillMint.net! This site is a wiki and archive for Hobart’s stories of utopia. üç• Vekllei On The Web Browse the links in the sidebar to get started. Look at the panels below for info on this site. üíå Site News üå∏ Administration This wiki was created in October 2020 to provide a comprehensive resource to the world of Vekllei, and as an archive for posts, bulletins, comics, illustrations and miscellaneous content related to Vekllei.
